original_text: He will always want to have more things for himself. He takes anything that he wants to have. He will always want to have more things for himself.
korean_text: 그는 마음에 평안을 알지 못하니 그가 기뻐하는 것을 하나도 보존하지 못하겠고

sentences.original_text: He will always want to have more things for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 항상 자신을 위해 더 많은 것을 갖고 싶어 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He takes anything that he wants to have
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 갖고 싶어 하는 어떤 것이든 가져간다

sentences.original_text: He will always want to have more things for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 항상 자신을 위해 더 많은 것을 갖고 싶어 할 것이다
